# apexcharter

> Htmlwidget for
> [apexcharts.js](https://github.com/apexcharts/apexcharts.js) : A
> modern JavaScript charting library to build interactive charts and
> visualizations with simple API. See the [online
> documentation](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/) for examples.

## Installation

Install from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=apexcharter)
with:

``` r
install.packages("apexcharter")
```

Or install the development version from
[GitHub](https://github.com/dreamRs/apexcharter) with:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("dreamRs/apexcharter")
```

## Quick Charts

Use `apex` function to quickly create visualizations :

``` r
library(apexcharter)
data("mpg", package = "ggplot2")
apex(data = mpg, type = "bar", mapping = aes(manufacturer))
```

![](reference/figures/apex-bar.png)

With datetime:

``` r
data("economics", package = "ggplot2")
apex(data = economics, type = "line", mapping = aes(x = date, y = uempmed)) %>% 
  ax_stroke(width = 1)
```

![](reference/figures/apex-line.png)

## Full API

All methods from ApexCharts are available with function like `ax_*`
compatible with pipe from `magrittr` :

``` r
library(apexcharter)
data(mpg, package = "ggplot2")

apexchart() %>% 
  ax_chart(type = "bar") %>% 
  ax_plotOptions(bar = bar_opts(
    horizontal = FALSE,
    endingShape = "flat",
    columnWidth = "70%",
    dataLabels = list(
      position = "top"
    ))
  ) %>% 
  ax_grid(
    show = TRUE,
    position = "front",
    borderColor = "#FFF"
  ) %>% 
  ax_series(list(
    name = "Count",
    data = tapply(mpg$manufacturer, mpg$manufacturer, length)
  )) %>% 
  ax_colors("#112446") %>% 
  ax_xaxis(categories = unique(mpg$manufacturer)) %>% 
  ax_title(text = "Number of models") %>% 
  ax_subtitle(text = "Data from ggplot2")
```

![](reference/figures/apexcharter-full-bar.png)

## Raw API

Pass a list of parameters to the function:

``` r
apexchart(ax_opts = list(
  chart = list(
    type = "line"
  ),
  stroke = list(
    curve = "smooth"
  ),
  grid = list(
    borderColor = "#e7e7e7",
    row = list(
      colors = c("#f3f3f3", "transparent"),
      opacity = 0.5
    )
  ),
  dataLabels = list(
    enabled = TRUE
  ),
  markers = list(style = "inverted", size = 6),
  series = list(
    list(
      name = "High",
      data = c(28, 29, 33, 36, 32, 32, 33)
    ),
    list(
      name = "Low",
      data = c(12, 11, 14, 18, 17, 13, 13)
    )
  ),
  title = list(
    text = "Average High & Low Temperature",
    align = "left"
  ),
  xaxis = list(
    categories = month.abb[1:7]
  ),
  yaxis = list(
    title = list(text = "Temperature"),
    labels = list(
      formatter = htmlwidgets::JS("function(value) {return value + '\u00b0C';}")
    )
  )
))
```

![](reference/figures/raw-api.png)

## Development

This package use [{packer}](https://github.com/JohnCoene/packer) to
manage JavaScript assets, see packerâ€™s
[documentation](https://packer.john-coene.com/#/) for more.

Install nodes modules with:

``` r
packer::npm_install()
```

Modify `srcjs/widgets/apexcharter.js`, then run:

``` r
packer::bundle()
```

Re-install R package and try
[`apexcharter()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/apexcharter-package.md)
or [`apex()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/apex.md)
functions.

# Package index

## All functions

- [`add_line()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/add-line.md)
  [`add_smooth_line()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/add-line.md)
  : Add a line to a chart

- [`add_shade()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/add-shade.md)
  [`add_shade_weekend()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/add-shade.md)
  : Add a shaded area to a chart

- [`add_hline()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/add-vh-lines.md)
  [`add_vline()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/add-vh-lines.md)
  : Add horizontal or vertical line

- [`add_event()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/add_event.md)
  : Add an event to a chart

- [`add_event_marker()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/add_event_marker.md)
  : Add an event marker to a chart

- [`add_point()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/add_point.md)
  : Add an annotation point

- [`ax_facet_wrap()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/apex-facets.md)
  [`ax_facet_grid()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/apex-facets.md)
  : Facets for ApexCharts

- [`apex()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/apex.md) :
  Quick ApexCharts

- [`apex_grid()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/apex_grid.md)
  : Create a grid of ApexCharts

- [`apexchart()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/apexchart.md)
  : Create an ApexCharts widget

- [`apexchartProxy()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/apexchartProxy.md)
  :

  Proxy for `apexchart`

- [`apexcharter-exports`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/apexcharter-exports.md)
  [`%>%`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/apexcharter-exports.md)
  [`aes`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/apexcharter-exports.md)
  [`vars`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/apexcharter-exports.md)
  [`label_value`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/apexcharter-exports.md)
  [`JS`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/apexcharter-exports.md)
  : apexcharter exported operators and S3 methods

- [`apexcharter`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/apexcharter-package.md)
  [`apexcharter-package`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/apexcharter-package.md)
  :

  An `htmlwidget` interface to the ApexCharts javascript chart library

- [`apexfacetOutput()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/apexcharter-shiny-facets.md)
  [`renderApexfacet()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/apexcharter-shiny-facets.md)
  : Shiny bindings for faceting with apexcharter

- [`apexgridOutput()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/apexcharter-shiny-grid.md)
  [`renderApexgrid()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/apexcharter-shiny-grid.md)
  : Shiny bindings for grid with apexcharter

- [`apexchartOutput()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/apexcharter-shiny.md)
  [`renderApexchart()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/apexcharter-shiny.md)
  [`sparkBoxOutput()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/apexcharter-shiny.md)
  [`renderSparkBox()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/apexcharter-shiny.md)
  : Shiny bindings for apexcharter

- [`ax_series()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/ax-series.md)
  [`ax_series2()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/ax-series.md)
  : Add data to a chart

- [`ax_annotations()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/ax_annotations.md)
  : Annotations properties

- [`ax_chart()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/ax_chart.md)
  : Chart parameters

- [`ax_colors()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/ax_colors.md)
  : Colors

- [`ax_colors_manual()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/ax_colors_manual.md)
  : Set specific color's series

- [`ax_dataLabels()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/ax_dataLabels.md)
  : Labels on data

- [`ax_fill()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/ax_fill.md)
  : Fill property

- [`ax_forecast_data_points()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/ax_forecast_data_points.md)
  : Forecast data points

- [`ax_grid()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/ax_grid.md)
  : Add grids on chart

- [`ax_labels()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/ax_labels.md)
  [`ax_labels2()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/ax_labels.md)
  : Alternative axis labels

- [`ax_labs()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/ax_labs.md)
  : Modify axis, legend, and chart labels

- [`ax_legend()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/ax_legend.md)
  : Legend properties

- [`ax_markers()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/ax_markers.md)
  : Markers properties

- [`ax_nodata()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/ax_nodata.md)
  : Configuration for charts with no data

- [`ax_plotOptions()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/ax_plotOptions.md)
  : Specific options for chart

- [`ax_proxy_options()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/ax_proxy_options.md)
  : Proxy for updating options

- [`ax_proxy_series()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/ax_proxy_series.md)
  : Proxy for updating series.

- [`ax_responsive()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/ax_responsive.md)
  : Responsive options

- [`ax_states()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/ax_states.md)
  : Charts' states

- [`ax_stroke()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/ax_stroke.md)
  : Stroke properties

- [`ax_subtitle()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/ax_subtitle.md)
  : Chart's subtitle

- [`ax_theme()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/ax_theme.md)
  : Theme for charts

- [`ax_title()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/ax_title.md)
  : Chart's title

- [`ax_tooltip()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/ax_tooltip.md)
  : Tooltip options

- [`ax_xaxis()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/ax_xaxis.md)
  : X-axis options

- [`ax_yaxis()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/ax_yaxis.md)
  : Y-axis options

- [`ax_yaxis2()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/ax_yaxis2.md)
  : Secondary Y-axis options

- [`bar_opts()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/bar_opts.md)
  : Bar options

- [`boxplot_opts()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/boxplot_opts.md)
  : Boxplot options

- [`bubble_opts()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/bubble_opts.md)
  : Bubble options

- [`candles`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/candles.md)
  : Candlestick demo data

- [`climate_paris`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/climate_paris.md)
  : Paris Climate

- [`config_update()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/config_update.md)
  : Configuration for auto update

- [`consumption`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/consumption.md)
  : Electricity consumption and forecasting

- [`eco2mix`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/eco2mix.md)
  : eco2mix data

- [`events_opts()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/events_opts.md)
  : Events options

- [`format_date()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/format_date.md)
  : Format date in JS

- [`format_num()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/format_num.md)
  : Format numbers (with D3)

- [`heatmap_opts()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/heatmap_opts.md)
  : Heatmap options

- [`label()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/label.md)
  : Label for annotations

- [`life_expec`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/life_expec.md)
  : Life expectancy data

- [`life_expec_long`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/life_expec_long.md)
  : Life expectancy data (long format)

- [`parse_df()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/parse_df.md)
  :

  Convert a `data.frame` to a `list`

- [`pie_opts()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/pie_opts.md)
  : Pie options

- [`radialBar_opts()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/radialBar_opts.md)
  : Radial bar options

- [`run_demo_input()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/run_demo_input.md)
  : Run Shiny input events examples

- [`run_demo_sparkbox()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/run_demo_sparkbox.md)
  : Run Shiny spark boxes example

- [`run_demo_sync()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/run_demo_sync.md)
  : Run Shiny synchronization example

- [`set_input_click()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/set_input_click.md)
  : Retrieve click information in Shiny

- [`set_input_export()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/set_input_export.md)
  : Retrieve chart's base64 dataURI.

- [`set_input_selection()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/set_input_selection.md)
  : Retrieve selection information in Shiny

- [`set_input_zoom()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/set_input_zoom.md)
  : Retrieve zoom information in Shiny

- [`set_tooltip_fixed()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/set_tooltip_fixed.md)
  : Fixed tooltip

- [`spark_box()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/spark_box.md)
  : Create a box with a sparkline

- [`temperatures`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/temperatures.md)
  : Temperature data

- [`unhcr_ts`](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/reference/unhcr_ts.md)
  : UNHCR data by continent of origin

  options](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/articles/extra/chart-options.md):

  charts](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/articles/extra/facets.md):

  application](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/articles/extra/shiny-integration.md):

  sparklines](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/articles/extra/spark-box.md):

  other](https://dreamrs.github.io/apexcharter/articles/extra/sync-charts.md):
